thread.title: Huckabee Calls Out the “Golden Calf” of Government Worshippers
thread.title_full: Huckabee Calls Out the “Golden Calf” of Government Worshippers

author: Harris
title: Huckabee Calls Out the “Golden Calf” of Government Worshippers
text:
REPORT: Rumors Say Arnold Schwarzenegger Is Considering a Senate Run 
Not only that, he hinted at the true problem of government the left is completely missing. 
Trump came to cause a “ major disruption ” to the status quo, Huckabee said. It is why so many people voted for him — because their rights as Americans were not being protected by a government that does things solely for the protection of itself — and its preferred racial and social classes. 
“This is at the zenith of what people are disgusted by,” Huckabee said. “It’s a war for the freedom that the American people have lost because of Washington.” Advertisement - story continues below 
Further he argued that so many people have too long worshipped the government, saying that they have “changed a real worship of God into the god of government. It is the new golden calf. And I think a lot of people are seeing Donald Trump as the guy coming down off the mountain and taking the golden calf and, in the proverbial words, of saying he’ll put it where the sun don’t shine.” 
See the segment below: 
This is the message so many of the left are missing: No government is God. And building a society around dependence on government is a recipe for failure. Advertisement - story continues below
